EmailTemplate.subject: Join Univar at the 20th Annual ACE Conference & Tradeshow - Aug 7-9
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Come visit Univar at the 20th annual ACE Conference and Tradeshow!
<!-- -->
Special Services
Access COA & MSDS Online Customer inventory management Individual packaging & labeling On-line Order Entry Rail-to-truck bulk transfer Tank Telemetry & Monitoring Technical Support Waste Management
As the leading supplier of sulfuric acid, urea, caustic soda liquid and other process chemicals to the Fuel Ethanol industry, Univar USA also provides extensive service packages that can be tailored to your production needs. Please stop by our booth #1147 to discuss how Univar’s products and services can let you focus on producing ethanol.
We look forward to seeing you at the ACE tradeshow next month!
Sincerely,
Steve Grohs
Regional Sales Manager – Biofuels
Univar USA Inc
Phone: (402) 738-4163
steven.grohs@univarusa.com
